title: First to Fight
description: He fought for our freedom. Will he show the same resolve pursuing the love he desires?Leaving the military portion of his life behind, Collin Porter is struggling to adjust to life as a civilian. While focused on opening a bar of his own, falling in love was the farthest thing from Collin’s mind. Yet the second he saw Rachel, he was a goner. That made it all the more painful when she smiled and strode right into the arms of his best friend. Just as her circumstances change and hope builds that the two may have a chance together, a face from Collin’s past reappears with a shocking revelation that will turn his world upside down. The Marine way is to make things work, even as circumstances change. Now, more than ever, Collin has something of his own to fight for.  First to Fight is the first novel of Justice's newest series. If you're searching for military romance packed with twists, turns, and heartwarming moments, look no further!
author: Alicia Justice
